ScriptSample.Name: Add-AD-UserGroup-to-Local-fe5e9239
ScriptSample.Title: Add AD User/Group to Local Administrator Group
ScriptSample.Author: Jaap Brasser
ScriptSample.Summary: The script can use either a plain text file containing a list of computername or a computer name as input and will add the trustee (AD user or group) as an administrator to the specified computer(s). The script will report back errors if the account is already a member.
